mapper.sql: zomore_commodity_sale_commodit_id, zomore_commodity_sale_id, zomore_commodity_name, zomore_commodity_num, zomore_commodity_money, zomore_commodity_type, zomore_commodity_shop
mapper.select: SELECT zomore_commodity_type AS type,SUM(zomore_commodity_money) AS money FROM zomore_service_commodity_salecommodit WHERE zomore_commodity_shop=#{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY zomore_commodity_type ORDER BY SUM(zomore_commodity_money) DESC LIMIT 0,5;

select
distinct
from zomore_service_commodity_salecommodit
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into zomore_service_commodity_salecommodit (zomore_commodity_sale_commodit_id, zomore_commodity_sale_id, zomore_commodity_name, zomore_commodity_num, zomore_commodity_money, zomore_commodity_type, zomore_commodity_shop) values (#{zomoreCommoditySaleCommoditId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zomoreCommoditySaleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zomoreCommodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zomoreCommodityNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zomoreCommodityMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zomoreCommodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zomoreCommodityShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
